content: So you can make a case, this shock has come at a time when we still can respond in a positive way. I don’t know how to prove or disprove that proposition. I think it’s quite possibly true. In that sense, it’s lowered my optimism. But my optimism about the mere election, given that the election is possible, I’m not as worried as a lot of people. I think there’s a chance it turns out to be a course correction that we needed, which is distinct from supporting the event itself.
